category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 32 (Board of Directors Resolution Method)
contents: Article 32 (Method of Board of Directors Resolution) ① The Board of Directors shall decide with the approval of the majority of registered directors. ② Directors whose participation in the Board of Directors is restricted by the Public Institutions Management Act and these Articles of Incorporation shall be subject to the number of registered directors pursuant to the provisions of Paragraph 1. ③ In unavoidable circumstances, the Chairman of the Board of Directors may deliberate and decide in writing in accordance with the method of Paragraph 1.
